data.title: A Full Timeline of Heidi Klum and Tom Kaulitz's V Cute and V Horny Relationship
data.meta_description: Heidi Klum and Tom Kaulitz's full relationship timeline—from the wild way they met to their secret wedding and everything in between.
data.text:
Stumbled in here because you just realized 80 million years late (JK, just four years) that Heidi Klum is married to Tom Kaulitz and suddenly need to know everything? Cool, just please prepare yourself accordingly, because we've put together a comprehensive timeline that's best described as a combination of horny (due to the nude pics) and confusing (due to the Halloween pics), which, combined, lead to extreme relationship cuteness.

February 22, 2018

Tom and Heidi meet for the first time, per TMZ! The place, you ask? A birthday party, at least according to Heidi who later told Ellen DeGeneres, "It was to the point so bad when I couldn’t even look at him. You know when you’re attracted to someone so badly you’re like, ‘Oh my gosh, I can’t even....’ So, I had to sit next to him instead of across because then I would have had to look at him.”

February 26, 2018

Heidi tells Ellen that she's single and ready to mingle! (Note: This is the interview Heidi filmed on the day she met Tom, which seemingly aired a few days later.)

March 27, 2018

Heidi and Tom are spotted making out on set of America's Got Talent—the first indication that they're together!

April 12, 2018

From then on out, they're pretty much non-stop photographed by paparazzi.

May 17, 2018

Heidi and Tom make their red carpet debut in France looking completely in love:

July 26, 2018

Heidi opens up about her and Tom's age gap to InStyle (via People), saying, "My boyfriend is many years younger than me, and lots of people are questioning that and asking about it. That's really the only time when age seems to be shoved in my face and I have to give an answer for it. I don't really think about it that much otherwise. You have to just live a happy life without worrying too much about what people think because worrying is only going to give you more wrinkles."

October 31, 2018

It's Heidiween, and Tom gets into the spirit of things by dressing as Shrek. The photos are best described as a lot. In the best way.

December 24, 2018

Tom proposes and Heidi says yes!

A source later tells People about the romantic proposal, saying, "They went to Mexico before their engagement, around Thanksgiving, and that's when he started talking to the kids about his plans in secret and it was so hard for them to not tell anyone. They were so excited and happy for their mom. Tom went to the kids and asked for Heidi's hand in marriage and they said 'yes.' So Tom and the kids together worked on making a breakfast tray for Heidi that had coffee, flowers, and a ring box. It was important for Tom to have the kids included in the whole thing, so they all brought the tray up to Heidi's room and surprised her with breakfast in bed and then he proposed."

December 27, 2018

Tom makes it clear he's enjoying engaged life:

January 2, 2019

Heidi tells Ellen, "I've been married twice. I still believe in love and marriage, I do. Even though I failed twice at it. I guess I'm not very good at it. I found a great person, so let's see what happens."

January 6, 2019

These two hit the red carpet and pack on the PDA.

February 22, 2019

Heidi and Tom get married! Which we find out literally months later. Sweetly, they tie the knot a year from the date they met, per TMZ.

March 20, 2019

Tom and Heidi go topless in their hotel, as ya do.

July 11, 2019

Entertainment Tonight reports that Heidi and Tom are married! Which again: we now know happened months prior.

August 4, 2019

Heidi and Tom have an official wedding weekend in Italy. It's gorgeous, in case you're wondering.

August 8, 2019

Tom and Heidi go on their honeymoon, and the vibes are loved up:

May 16, 2020

Heidi informs us it's the weekend, in the event that you were confused:

May 12, 2021

Tom gives Heidi a piece of the Berlin Wall for her birthday (!!).

She later tells ET, "He did give me a piece of the Berlin Wall, it's gigantic, it was shipped on a boat with the crane put into our backyard. It's a beautiful art piece. I guess people, when they heard about this, they were like, 'What do you mean, you can buy things like that?' Yeah, I mean, there are pieces of the wall for sale and if you're into art and especially sculptures... I love sculptures and I love art in general and my husband knew that and since he is from East Berlin, you know, basically, this is from where these Berlin people were inside and they couldn't get out, so, you know, it means something and is very special to him."

May 17, 2021

Heidi tells Entertainment Tonight, "I mean, I found my match, finally, like I am very romantic and I do a lot of weird things, like I leave notes everywhere and I do a lot of things for him and it's beautiful when you get that back from your partner. And it's the first time I feel like I really have a partner to do everything with."

She adds, "Yeah, I mean it took a while, you know, I'm going to be 48 and it's the third time, the third time's the charm."

June 17, 2021

And then they go topless on vacation:

October 31, 2022

Heidi dresses as a worm for Halloween and Tom bravely volunteers to be her fisherman.

January 1, 2023

Heidi and Tom ring in the New Year!

February 22, 2023

Heidi chats about the possibility of having another kid, saying, "It depends what day it is. Sometimes I'm here, sometimes I'm here. I mean, it's a lot. I've done it four times. And then I breastfed eight months each time, and then I was pregnant again. Three times in a row."

She also celebrates her anniversary with some nearly nude pics!

July 17, 2023

These two go on vacation, remain obsessed with each other, AND become that couple who can't stop matching.

September 5, 2023

Heidi surprises her man with not one, but two cute puppies.

December 25, 2023

Heidi and Tom spend Christmas together in St. Barts, and honestly the content is iconic:

March 10, 2024

These two attend the Vanity Fair Oscar Party and look chic whilst rocking similar hair:

That brings us up to date, but we'll keep you informed about Heidi and Tom's cute vibes, fear not.
